title: BRIEF-Taiwan's UMC orders machinery equipment from Lam Research
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's UMC orders machinery equipment from Lam Research 
Oct 23 United Microelectronics Corp 
* Says orders machinery equipment worth T$518.6 million ($16.01 million) 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1PFA6gv 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 32.3860 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
